name: ABX-SYNCHRONICITY_MAP
function: Computes synchronicity envelopes (SE) across domains using structured TVM frames and deterministic metrics (TCI, SIS, CPA, RAC, PUR).
inputs: frames: List of TVM vector frames (structured, numeric)
outputs: synchronicity_envelopes: SE packets with metrics and provenance
canonical_statement: ϟ₁₀ (SYNCHRONICITY_MAP) detects cross-domain synchronicity envelopes via deterministic metrics and emits observation-only SE packets without causal assertions or domain privilege.
